item.title: Demo of Graide: AI Powered Assistive Grading Engine
item.description: I have been helping people at 6bit testing and adding new features to Graide, a platform that reduces grading workload while increasing the quality of feedback to be given to students. Check how it works! I have been demo-ing at L@S2022 where the issues related to teaching and learning at scale have been discussed.
